name: pieceForSmartphoneOrchestra
description: A sound piece for smartphone orchestra.

scripts.make-png-icons: for size in 48 72 96 144 192 256 384 512; do ffmpeg -i tikz/pieceForSmartphoneOrchestraIcon.svg -vf scale=${size}:-1 public/icons/smartphoneOrchestraIcon-${size}x${size}.png; done
scripts.premake-favicon: if [ ! -f public/icons/favicon.png ]; then xelatex tikz/favicon.tex; fi
